 2024-11802024-11-08JUS
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
PrecisAppointment of the HONOURABLE JEAN-FRANÇOIS ROBERGE, a Judge of the Court of Quebec, to be a Judge of the Superior Court of Quebec for the district of Montréal, with residence in the territory of ville de Montréal or in the immediate vicinity thereof.
